questions.question: What devices are acceptable to plug into your CRCAs?

answers.a: A cell phone to listen to music
A cell phone to charge it only
A personal USB drive to copy files

questions.question: What must be done when making a change to a CRCA? (pick 3)

answers.a: Install all available Microsoft Office feature patches
answers.r: Nope. This isn't part of the process.

answers.a: Assess security impacts and mitigate any issues
Request approval from NERC for the change

questions.question: How often do new security patches need to be assessed?
Once assessed, how quickly do patches need to be installed?

answers.a: Within one month (35 days) of assessment
In the same quarter as assessment

questions.question: (Finish the sentence) If a patch causes a reliability problem...

answers.a: We still have to install it within 35 days
answers.r: No. The best security increases reliability

answers.a: We don't have to install it.
answers.r: That's partially true, but not quite right

answers.a: We don't have to install it - if we document and follow a mitigation plan.
answers.r: Yes! The mitigation plan is key
